node.name: Africa Retail Expansion Summit
node.description: Africa has been yielding increased oppertunities in the retail market for several years in a row. Enhanced consumerisim, a young population, a growing middle class and winder access to technology are strong factors adding to the success of the market in the entire continent. Kenya is ranked first when it comes to projects in piplene. Asecond country of importance in East Africa is Tanzania, which is said to have huge untapped potential.

node.name: BNamericas 5th Mexico Infrastructure Summit
node.description: This summit will analyze the opportunities available to companies in the sector and offer unique networking opportunities between government authorities, investors, project developers, operators, and decision makers in the infrastructure sector.

node.name: BIOMALAYSIA & ASIA PACIFIC BIOECONOMY 2016
node.description: The Malaysian Ministry of Science, Technology & Innovation (MOSTI) and Malaysian Biotechnology Corporation (BiotechCorp) are proud to be the host of BIOMALAYSIA & ASIA PACIFIC BIOECONOMY 2016 which will be held from 31 May – 2 June 2016 at Kuala Lumpur Convention Centre, Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.

node.name: CECC 2016
node.description: CECC 2016 will gather the leading companies and executives in the Mexican gas and power sectors. Those involved in the CCGT business must attend CECC in order to land contracts and gain further understanding of the new market proceedings and outlook.

node.name: Middle East Securities Forum 2016
node.description: Meet and network with your peers in the securities operations and post-trade industry – they will all be here! Build relationships with new prospects and existing contacts - during the coffee breaks, lunches, VIP roundtables, breakfast briefings and the drinks reception.

node.name: Colombia Genera 2016
node.description: ANDI, the National Business Association of Colombia presents the 5th version of the event Colombia Genera, which aims to promote the consolidation of the mining and energy sector and the productive chains in the competitive development. The agenda for 2016 is focused in an analysis of the future and the discussion of challenges and opportunities of the country for the development of this sector and the industry in general.

node.name: The 4th Annual GCC Contractor Health and Safety Management Forum
node.description: Contractor Health and Safety is an essential component of industry operations and a key responsibility for those managing and performing routine work or projects, it is an important determinant of overall Project success or failure. The majority of industries believe that effective Contractor Safety programs enhances work and projects management because it assists Contractors to systematically identify and evaluate anticipated hazards and establishes controls in advance of actual work. They also play a significant role in the economic growth and infrastructure development of nations and especially in the GCC states.

node.name: Art for Tomorrow
node.description: Set against the striking cityscape of Doha, Art for Tomorrow brings together world-famous artists and architects, with leading museum directors, urban developers, policy-makers and financiers to address these critical issues and their impact on the creative cities of tomorrow.

node.name: Arabian Hotel Investment Conference
node.description: With 11 years under our belt, AHIC has proven to be the Middle East's annual meeting place for the region's most senior hotel investors, developers, operators and advisors. It is the annual conference that connects business leaders from international and local markets to do deals across the region.

node.name: Dubai International Government Achievements Exhibition
node.description: Held under the patronage of His Highness Sheikh Mohammed Bin Rashid Al Maktoum, UAE Vice President & Prime Minister and Ruler of Dubai, DIGAE is a multi-tiered event with a conference, an exhibition, workshop, a smart lab, and a cooperation hub. DIGAE Strategic Focus highlights the synergies between key developmental pillars, areas of concerns and ways of improvement for countries ready to deliver an inspiring framework of public service to their communities. DIGAE offers an enriching outlook into the winning and successful solutions devised, planned and implemented by local governments across the globe and an insight into the future of smart government.

node.name: The Ghana Summit – Oil, Gas & Power
node.description: The Ghana Summit – Oil, Gas & Power Summit and Exhibition returns for its 7th edition to Accra in April 2016 and is only event committed to driving Ghana's oil, gas and power potential forward. This is the official meeting of the Government and the decision makers of the oil, gas and power sector of Ghana where energy policy is actually made. The event has a strong local as well as international attendance, enabling fantastic networking and new partnerships

node.name: Oman Energy & Water Exhibition & Conference
node.description: The Oman Energy & Water Exhibition & Conference is an international event dedicated to the power generation, renewable and alternative energy and transmission and distribution, and water-related industries. It is designed to be a platform for stakeholders to discuss real issues and solutions to the energy and water challenges and opportunities in Oman.

node.name: The Oman Waste & Environmental Services Exhibition & Conference (OWES)
node.description: OWES brings together policy makers, domain experts, engineers, technology companies, scientists, researchers, students, entrepreneurs, equipment suppliers and other professionals on a single platform to discuss environmental challenges in Oman and explore plausible solutions.

node.name: International Gas Technology Conference
node.description: Delegates will be updated about the latest technology developments, participate in interactive discussions as well as meet technology providers and gas producers from the Middle East, North Africa, Russia, Turkmenistan, Kazakhstan, Uzbekistan, Azerbaijan and other countries.

node.name: UK-Sierra Leone Trade & Investment Forum
node.description: The Forum is Sierra Leone's most significant investment event since the ending of the recent Ebola outbreak and an important part of the country's agenda to restore and strengthen private sector growth and to encourage new inward investment.

node.name: UK-Guinea Trade & Investment Forum
node.description: The Forum is Guinea's most significant investment event on the international stage since Presidential elections in 2015 and an important part of the country's post-Ebola economic recovery agenda.

node.name: Investeurasia 2016
node.description: Investeurasia 2016, the International Trade fair for Property, Project and Investment is opening its doors in Antalya, the splendid city of the Mediterranean. The newly launched Project aims to bring together the leading companies from the European and Middle East countries in the meeting point of the two continents.

node.name: Global Water Summit 2016
node.description: Founded in 2006, The Global Water Summit remains a unique event for the water sector. Not only does the event assemble more top corporate executives and water leaders than any other event, it also acknowledges the intrinsic connection between water and money and sets out to revolutionise the role of water in the global economy.

node.name: Responsible Finance Summit
node.description: The Responsible Finance Summit is hosted by Bank Negara Malaysia at Sasana kijang, the iconic center of thought and leadership in Islamic finance. Organized by the RFI foundation and (co-organized by) Middle East Global Advisors, the summit aims to support the agenda of sustainable and inclusive economy and connections within the broader responsible finance industry.

node.name: 4th Annual Airport Development & Expansion Summit
node.description: The competition for global hubs is becoming increasingly challenging and the power balance in the airport industry is beginning to shift from the West to the East, spurred by growth in emerging economies. In the Middle East: Abu Dhabi, Dubai and Doha are fighting to become major airport hubs. In Turkey, Istanbul New Airport is currently under construction and the giant 150 million passenger capacity air terminal will underscore Istanbul's growing reputation as a global air travel hub. In Central and Eastern Europe many upgrade projects have been launched or are about to be launched such as Domodedovo, Sheremetyevo, Zagreb, Crete Kasteli, Heathrow, Frankfurt and Zurich Airports. At Noppen`s 4th Annual Airport Development & Expansion Summit, Istanbul will once again welcome the international experts. Airport authorities, operators, civil aviation executives, government officials and construction companies will go in discussion with consultants, architects, equipment providers and service groups, exploring the market and supporting project development.

node.name: Cityscape Abu Dhabi 2016
node.description: The capital's largest and most influential property exhibition is back. With hundreds of developments from Abu Dhabi and overseas being showcased, Cityscape Abu Dhabi 2016 is the home of real estate investment for the residential, retail, hospitality and commercial sectors.

node.name: 4th Investing in Turkey Forum
node.description: This exciting event has been organised to provide a networking platform for business professionals to explore the key investment opportunities in Turkey, including: PPP infrastructure projects from transport (airports, roads, bridges, railways); education (schools and universities); healthcare (hospitals, health campuses, laboratories) as well as prospects in energy, renewable energy, private equity and real estate sector.

node.name: The Mediterranean Oil & Gas Summit
node.description: The Summit will provide a unique networking platform for representatives of different Ministries and high-ranking officials from all around the world to converse and connect with companies that are interested to operate in the region and create new ventures. IRN has been consistently cooperating with most ministries of the Mediterranean, with countries such as Albania, Greece, Spain, Italy, Malta, Egypt, Libya, Morocco, Croatia, Cyprus, Lebanon and Morocco, yielding excellent results and relations.

node.name: 3rd Annual Iran Oil, Gas & Energy Week
node.description: RN is pleased to bring you the 3rd Annual Iran Oil, Gas & Energy Week, taking place in Mövenpick Hotel, Istanbul on 1-3rd March 2016. IRN is a world leader in oil, gas and energy events, holding exceptional relationships with IOCs around the globe. IRN has previously organised two Summits on Iran's oil and gas sector which took place 2014 and 2015, and will now host the third, and biggest event yet.

node.name: The Iran International Banking 2016 Forum
node.description: The Iran International Banking 2016 Forum aims at examining the current situation of Iran banking, providing insights on how it needs to evolve in the coming months and years, and giving more clarity on ways international financial institutions and Iranian banks can reconnect in the most time-efficient manner and in a way that makes financial and operational sense.

node.name: The Nigeria Summit
node.description: Themed, “The Dawn of A New Day?”, The Economist Events' Nigeria Summit will examine and review the various opportunities and challenges that Nigeria is facing in view of her first democratic power transfer and the implications of the global macro-economic forces which are being shaped by the dramatic fall in oil prices, the mainstay of the Nigerian economy. More than 350 key government ministries, industry and business leaders, international investors, economists and academics will discuss and debate what the future holds for Nigeria.

node.name: Abu Dhabi International Downstream Summit 2016
node.description: Having been co-hosted by Abu Dhabi Oil Refining Company Takreer for the past 13 years, Abu Dhabi International Downstream is a carefully crafted refining and petrochemicals summit that provides you with an unparalleled platform to discuss market dynamics, highlight new projects and hear about all of the latest technologies which are shaping the refining and petrochemical complexes of the future and that will help the region remain competitive in a low oil price environment.

node.name: Kuwait Oil and Gas Summit
node.description: The 4th Kuwait Oil &

node.name: Kuwait Investment Forum
node.description: Under the Patronage of His Highness the Emir of Kuwait Sheikh Sabah Al Ahmad Al Jaber Al Sabah, the Kuwait Direct Investment Promotion Authority is organizing “Kuwait Investment Forum” on the 8th and 9th of March 2016 at Arraya Ballroom at the Marriot Courtyard Hotel in Kuwait.

node.name: 4th Mexico Electric Power Summit
node.description: BNamericas Mexico Electric Power Summit is a strategic conference bringing together key industry players, including government authorities and regulators, operators, service providers and financing entities. This fourth edition will analyze the new phase in which the sector is entering, with special focus on the growing participation that private investors will have in the industry's development and in the many natural gas transport, power generation & transmission projects planned ahead. The new model being embraced by the CFE, the challenges and opportunities in the area of renewable energy and the relationship between large consumers and generators will also be discussed. Funding needs in this new phase of the industry will be another important theme to be discussed at the summit.

node.name: The 2nd Argentina Shale Gas and Oil Summit 2016
node.description: The 2nd Argentina Shale Gas and Oil Summit 2016 is a two-day conference, exhibition, networking event and press day for the shale gas sector across Argentina.

node.name: 3rd Annual Saudi Arabia Transport & infrastructure 2016
node.description: This event is focused on Land Transport & Infrastructure development that is currently underway in Saudi Arabia. Railway infrastructure spending in Saudi Arabia is growing immensely due to high investment by the government. Major emphasis is also being placed on the development of freight transport in the country along with passenger focus. In addition, the GCC government is planning to construct a railway network that will link other regions. The construction of HSR network is also gaining more importance due to its connectivity to major holy cities thereby leading to a rise in railways revenue.

node.name: The Private Wealth Latin America & The Caribbean Forum
node.description: The Private Wealth Latin America & The Caribbean Forum is a pan-regional wealth management, wealth planning and investment management international meeting for private banks, HNWIs, wealth managers, and family offices. The Forum brings together 500+ industry leaders from Latin American and Caribbean Private Wealth Management field for a two day conference discussing strategies to protect, preserve and grow wealth.

node.name: 3rd Annual Mexico Energy Summit
node.description: This is the 3rd Energy Summit in a series of high-level Energy Summits Markets Group will host in Peru, Colombia, Mexico and Panama in 2016. The Summit will feature “New Energy Projects in Mexico: Planning, Investment and Operations”

node.name: 2nd Annual Private Wealth Andean Forum
node.description: The Private Wealth Andean Forum is a regional private banking, wealth planning and investment management meeting for private banks, family offices, and the private client intermediary. The forum brings together 200+ industry leaders form the Andean region's private wealth management field to discuss wealth growth, asset protection, private banking, trusts, philanthropy, and estate planning. Some profiles included are family offices, private bankers, wealth managers, asset managers, trust companies, legal professionals, offshore jurisdictions, and private client intermediaries.

node.name: The 6th Annual Mexico Investors Forum
node.description: The Mexico Investors Forum is geared towards the educational needs of Mexico's largest institutional investors (over $190 billion in AUM) and family offices. Over the course of the one day summit, more than 300 local and global private pension funds, foundations, endowments and family offices will gather to hear insight from over 80 expert speakers discussing global equities, fixed income, regulation, private equity, hedge funds, commodity strategies and exchange traded funds.

node.name: The Mozambique Power Infrastructure & Clean Energy Investment Conference
node.description: The event promises to provide an unprecedented informative and networking platform featuring the great opportunities for partnership, cooperation and investment into the enormous renewable energy potential of Mozambique. It will bring together under one roof both public and private sectors, including international project developers, relevant government officials, leading financiers and IFIs, as well as corporate executives and entrepreneurs.

node.name: The 6th Zambia International Mining & Energy Conference & Exhibition
node.description: ZIMEC 2016 provides the definitive platform for showcasing Zambia's mineral and power potential and connecting with industry professionals. The last edition attracted 250 delegates and 50 exhibitors.

node.name: Mexico Capital Projects & Infrastructure Summit
node.description: The Mexico Capital Projects & Infrastructure Summit 2016 is the premier gathering of global public and private infrastructure developers and financers in Mexico, brought to you by Markets Group. Our high-impact platform, focusing on local projects and operational and financial challenges unique to the Mexican infrastructure market, will attract 350 delegates from top-tier organizations in energy, transport, telecom, and social infrastructure.

node.name: Latin America Fixed Income Forum
node.description: The Latin America Fixed Income Investors Forum is a 250 delegate pan-regional meeting focused on and designed alongside leading Fixed Income investors on Latin America including Central Banks, Pension Funds and Sovereign Reserves. The one day meeting will demystify the low yield environment and establish best practices in selection of external asset managers.

node.name: Central American & Caribbean Energy Summit
node.description: The Central American & Caribbean Energy Summit will unite the regions gathering the largest energy companies, regulators, operators, investors and government leaders to discuss opportunities about a wide variety of topics including: Oil & Gas, electricity, renewables, petrochemicals, technology, financial, risk and legislative sectors.

node.name: Andean Capital Projects & Infrastructure Summit
node.description: The Andean Capital Projects & Infrastructure Summit 2016 is the premier gathering of global public and private infrastructure developers and financers in the Andean Region, brought to you by Markets Group. Our high-impact platform, focusing on local projects and operational and financial challenges unique to the Mexican infrastructure market, will attract 350 delegates from top-tier organizations in energy, transport, telecom, and social infrastructure.

node.name: Iran after the Embargo
node.description: Iranian and Turkish Association for Energy Economics collaborated to organize the International Conference on “Iran after the Embargo” taking place on January 22-23, 2016 at the Akra Barut Hotel, Antalya,Turkey. The aim of this conference is to bridge communication between business, government, academic and other professionals of Iran and other countries, facilitate new contacts, bring about positive discussion and dialogue that produces growth and expansion within the energy industries, elaborate on the challenges and opportunities of investment and business in Iran from all perspectives. You are cordially invited to an after-embargo historic event to engage in new business opportunities with Iran.

node.name: Pan American Mature Fields Congress
node.description: The second edition of Pan American Mature Fields Congress is the largest world-class event focusing on optimizing mature fields. International experts will discuss the latest technology and best practices in production, EOR/IOR, cost efficiencies and more. With new Mexican bidding rounds in process, it's the perfect place and time for the industry to gather.

node.name: Middle East Insurance Forum
node.description: The region's leading insurance platform that has served a key role in the development of the industry and driving its growth for the past 12 years. Held under the patronage of the Central Bank of Bahrain, the forum partners with the region's largest insurance organizations in converging the most distinguished leaders in insurance under a single platform to assess the direction of the industry and chart new ways for its growth.

node.name: The 5th Colombian Investors Forum
node.description: Don't miss the opportunity to see Antanas Mockus give his keynote presentation at the 5th Colombian Investors Forum taking place at the NH Collection Teleport Royal in Bogota on February 11th . The meeting is the leading investor platform in Colombia and provides all attendees the best access to the most active investors including pension funds, insurance companies foundations & endowments, family offices, regulatory agencies and asset managers. Mr. Mockus was elected mayor of Bogotá in two occasions (1995--1997 and 2001-2003). His approach to public policy reduced the rate of homicides, improved the financial situation of the district, introduced the culture of planning by objectives and established the participatory budgeting in many locations. Request an agenda for the complete speaker list and panel topics.

node.name: The Global Restaurant Investment Forum
node.description: The Global Restaurant Investment Forum (GRIF) facilitates investment decision-making within the restaurant space. The forum showcases the hottest restaurant concepts from around the globe and gives attendees a place of focus to connect with investors, owners, franchisors and senior hospitality professionals, assess the state of the hospitality industry and secure deals for the coming year. GRIF 2016 will be powered by Michelin, enriching the event with its extensive network and world class chefs.

node.name: International Water Summit
node.description: The 2016 edition of International Water Summit (IWS) is set to attract global experts, decision makers, and business innovators to address the impending water demand and supply gap in the Middle East.

node.name: EcoWASTE
node.description: The third edition of EcoWASTE is set to highlight solutions to sustainably and effectively manage the increasing waste generation in the region.

node.name: The 10th GCC Regulators Summit
node.description: The 10th GCC Regulators Summit will take place in Abu Dhabi, UAE in association with the Abu Dhabi Global Market (ADGM) and under the patronage of the UAE Minister of Economy, H.E Sultan bin Saeed Al Mansouri. Celebrating it's 10th year, the summit is the region's leading forum for the Regulatory and the Governance, Risk and Compliance (GRC) community. Attracting almost 600 people it has established itself as the largest summit of its kind in the Middle East. The 10th GCC regulators summit will present you with the opportunity to hear from global and local regulators, business leaders, key opinion leaders and experts as well as leading practitioners from across the region, discussing the issues that will impact your community in 2016.

node.name: The 4th Annual Africa Airport Expansion & Development Summit
node.description: Over the past few years, business activities at African airports have grown from 45% to a staggering 80%. Passenger and cargo traffic volumes are growing at a never seen rate and to accommodate this increase, many airports are upgrading and there are plans for at least 40 new airports across the continent. Opportunities for airport contractors, suppliers of airport equipment, management services and other products and services are unprecedented. At the 4th Africa Airport Expansion Summit; government officials, investors, civil aviation authorities and airport management groups will go in discussion with consultants, architects, construction companies, equipment providers and service groups, in order to better explore the market and support the project development.

node.name: The Africa Health Business Symposium
node.description: The Africa Health Business Symposium which be held at the Safari Park - Nairobi from 6-7th October 2016 and will be a high level pan African healthcare event bringing together the top leadership in the healthcare space, both from the public as private sector.

node.name: International Forum on Islamic Finance
node.description: The 2nd International Forum on Islamic Finance (IFIF) will serve as a platform for the International Islamic finance and investments industry to converge in Khartoum to develop effective strategic action plans aimed at realizing the Islamic banking and finance opportunity in Africa.

node.name: The 7th Gulf Intelligence UAE Energy Forum
node.description: The 7th Gulf Intelligence UAE Energy Forum will be held on Jan 12 2016 at the Rosewood Hotel in Abu Dhabi under the Patronage of H.E. Suhail Al Mazrouei Minister of Energy, UAE. The forum will bring together key stakeholders in the UAE and Gulf energy sector to discuss and debate critical issues affecting the industry under the theme of “The 2016 Outlook: the Era of Energy Abundance and Disruption?” Topics to be debated at the UAE Energy Forum will include the outlook for South South Energy Corridor, 2016 Oil Price Outlook, Outlook for Gas, Disruption in the Energy Industry and Energy Macro Economics.

node.name: Peru Energy Summit
node.description: The Peru Energy Summit, in its 3rd year, will examine major investment, development and operational challenges and opportunities present in the market, with over 30 presenters and 200 attendees attending from the most important public and private entities actively participating in the market

node.name: Kingdom Smart Economic Cities Summit
node.description: A city can be considered 'Intelligent' when there are investments, participatory action and engagement in all areas to provide a well connected and high quality of life. Saudi Arabia's market is the largest for smart technology within Gulf and Arab countries. Saudi Arabia has stepped into a future of innovation technology where the respective leaders are focusing on a sustainable and smarter future. Smart City projects have been developed to attract business while controlling sprawl and congestion in the Kingdom. The Kingdom Smart Economic Cities Summit, which will be held in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia on 15th & 16th March'16, will enable and equip Kingdom's stake holders with Smart Cities Technologies & Secure ICT solutions.

node.name: Russia & CIS Oil & Gas Executive Summit
node.description: The Executive Summit is recognised as the leading platform for senior level oil & gas leaders involved in developing the downstream strategy for their companies, government bodies, market participants, industry experts and analysts, which collaborative approach can impact the industry future in Russia & CIS and the world.

node.name: 3RD ANNUAL PRIVATE WEALTH PANAMA FORUM
node.description: The Private Wealth Panama Forum is a Panama focused asset protection meeting for private banks, wealth managers, trust companies, legal professionals and other intermediaries. The Forum brings together 200+ industry leaders from Panama and around the world to discuss private banking, tax, trust, bearer shares, foundations,corporate structures, estate planning and wealth growth in one of the world's banking and legal centers.

node.name: Mexico GRI 2016
node.description: Mexico GRI 2016 connects senior investors, developers and lenders who exchange theirs views and deepen their relationships during the closed-door discussions and networking sessions. It offers an effective way identify those with whom you share common interests and would enjoy working with, in a relaxed and intimate atmosphere.

node.name: US-Turkey Investment Partnership Summit
node.description: For the first time, the American-Turkish Council is organizing a day-long Summit on U.S.-Turkey investment and business partnerships. The Summit, featuring six expert roundtable discussions, a Luncheon, and a Networking Reception, will bring together leading companies from the U.S. and Turkey to explore the comparative advantages each side of the relationship provides the other. As a premier occasion for U.S. and Turkey-based business leaders interested in collaborative opportunities, the Summit will draw out the multiple opportunities for businesses arising from mutual investment and commercial interests.

node.name: Suez Canal Global Conference
node.description: Suez Canal Global Conference will discuss both the challenges & opportunities for the Suez Canal & Suez Canal Zone. These discussions aim to keep SC the first choice for shipping companies, Liners, ship owners & ship operators developing the Suez Canal Zone, transforming it into a world class global logistics hub & Industrial processing center to serve the global market. The event is supported by the main international entities which control and manage this vital industry over the world, such as; IMO, ICS, INTERCARGO & INTERTANKO.

node.name: Made in China Exhibition QATAR 2015
node.description: Made in China Exhibition QATAR 2015, organized by Qatar Chamber of Commerce and Industry, will be held on Dec.14-16, 2015 in Doha Exhibition & Convention Center with the theme as “Construction and Technology”. We will welcome over 100 Chinese leading companies in related industries. This is the first B2B & B2G comprehensive showcase of high-end Chinese products in MENA region.

node.name: Africa Energy Investment Summit 2016
node.description: The Africa Energy Investment Summit will in the coming years become a flagship event for the Power & Energy sector in Africa - for policy makers in governments, corporate businesses, finance houses and all other professionals in the sector. The Summit presents an opportunity to engage with a wide variety of professionals in the field whilst attending presentations, participating in debates and generally taking stock of where you are in your respective field compared to your peers, either growing your investment portfolio or sharing your learning and experiences in the field of power & energy and the energy infrastructure development for sub Saharan Africa. All of this happens in a context that is dynamic and fun where there is no such thing as a small player. Get the insight into the region investment climate, energy sector policy and regulations, projects needing equity finance, project sponsors looking for partners, etc. For more information please go to our event website at http://www.nkmevents.com/aeis.

node.name: Zambiabuild 2016
node.description: After the huge success of the first edition, which included 32 exhibitors from 12 countries and 500+ participants, ZambiaBuild returns with a larger and more comprehensive range of exhibitors, to showcase and promote businesses in a faster growing industry. A wide ranging programme will explore every key issue and work with notable industry leaders and organisations to address current issues and future prospects. Over the two-day event, there will be a trade exhibition, series of workshops, B2B meetings, delegations, visitors from public and private sectors.

node.name: Annual Investment Meeting
node.description: AIM 2016 will be the occasion to gather the world's leading academics, experts and practitioners as well as policy makers to examine this emerging new world of foreign direct investment. The new forms of international investment as well as the new sources of FDI will be analyzed in their scope and magnitude and experiences will be shared on how to attract them and benefit from them to achieve inclusive economic growth and sustainable development.

node.name: Ghana Gulf Investment Forum
node.description: The GHANA GULF INVESTMENT FORUM is a first-of-its-kind event in Ghana that will focus on the robust trade and investment landscape and potential of Ghana and its particular appeal to the GCC – through presentations, case studies and panel sessions.

node.name: The Inaugural Africa Airfinance Conference
node.description: The conference will examine the key challenges facing the African aviation finance industry and the developments needed to encourage market growth, while providing unrivalled networking with the industry's key players.

node.name: Frontier Exchange MENA
node.description: Taking place in the heart of London's financial district, Frontier Exchange MENA is a roadshow of Listed and Growth Companies from across the Middle East and North Africa.

node.name: International Property Show
node.description: Accredited by the Dubai Real Estate Regulatory Authority (RERA), International Property Show is the leading consumer event in Dubai making it a perfect platform for both International and local real estate markets to showcase their residential, commercial and mixed-use real estate products and to conduct serious transactional business.

node.name: International Petroleum Technology Conference
node.description: The 9th edition of the International Petroleum Technology Conference (IPTC) is set to return to Doha, Qatar, from 7–9 December 2015. IPTC is an annual event rotating between Asia Pacific and the Middle East. The scope of the conference programme and associated industry activities address technology and relevant industry issues that challenge industry professionals and management around the world. IPTC is a collaborative effort among the American Association of Petroleum Geologists (AAPG); the European Association of Geoscientists and Engineers (EAGE); the Society of Exploration Geophysicists (SEG); and the Society of Petroleum Engineers (SPE). For more information, please visit www.iptcnet.org/2015/doha/.

node.name: Offshore West Africa 2016
node.description: Offshore West Africa offers a unique insight into this exciting and progressive marketplace and including this key industry event as a vital component of your company's marketing strategy ensures one-on-one access to key industry professionals from around the world, all in one place.

node.name: Kuwait Projects
node.description: Organised by MEED Events for more than a decade in partnership with the likes of the Kuwait Petroleum Corporation (KPC), Kuwait National Petroleum Company (KNPC), Kuwait Oil Company, Kuwait Authority for Partnership Projects (KAPP) & the Ministries of Public Works, Health and Electricity & Water, the event provides the opportunity to align yourselves with the major stakeholders shaping Kuwait's projects landscape & further grasp key decisions & movements taking place within Kuwait's projects market.

node.name: Iran Petrochemical Forum (IPF)
node.description: The National Petrochemical Company (NPC) of Iran is pleased to announce that it will hold its 12th annual international Iran Petrochemical Forum (IPF) on December 13-14, 2015 in Tehran, Iran. The Forum, one of the world's most prestigious events representing the petrochemical industry, will address the core issues that industry is facing.

node.name: International Dance Festival
node.description: The friends-of-the-Arts foundation is dedicated to 'Education through Movement'

node.name: PDAC International Convention, Trade Show & Investors Exchange
node.description: PDAC International Convention, Trade Show & Investors Exchange is the world's leading Convention for people, companies and organizations in, or connected with, mineral exploration. In addition to meeting over 1,000 exhibitors and 23,500 attendees from over 100 countries, you can also attend technical sessions, short courses and networking events.

node.name: Saudi Mega Projects
node.description: The Saudi Mega Projects Conference & Exhibition is a unique opportunity to gain unprecedented access into the biggest project's market in the Middle East with a dedicated agenda of content and networking activities focused on collaboration, networking, critical market project programme intelligence, design, bid and build opportunities.

node.name: Powering Africa: Summit
node.description: The Powering Africa: Summit (PAS) is a platform to showcase power, trade and infrastructure investment opportunities across the African continent, engaging decision makers from the American and African public and private sectors to explore how project bankability can be increased.

node.name: Egypt Energy Investment Summit
node.description: EnergyNet will host the Egypt Energy Investment Summit in Cairo in February 2016. The Summit will bring together the world's leading power developers, investors and technology and solution providers to discuss capacity building within Egypt's industrial communities, creating a dynamic platform for the accelerated development of Egypt's energy sector.

node.name: ClickZ Live Bangkok
node.description: ClickZ Live Bangkok covers the hottest trends in digital marketing providing you with the very latest tools and tactics to help you reach your target consumers more effectively, whether locally in Thailand or overseas.

node.name: The Central American & Caribbean Energy Summit
node.description: The Central American & Caribbean Energy Summit will unite the regions largest energy companies, regulators, operators, investors and government leaders to discuss opportunities about a wide variety of topics including: Oil & Gas, electricity, renewable energy, petrochemicals, technology, financial, risk and policy.

node.name: AM Meetings Baja California
node.description: AM Meetings Baja California is Mexico's first one-to-one meetings platform which connects decision makers with suppliers in the advanced manufacturing and technologies sector.

node.name: African Leadership Network
node.description: This year will be the first time that an ALN Annual Gathering is held in North Africa. The region is one of the wealthiest on the continent, with an expected growth rate of 3.5% by 2017. And Morocco has become one of the region's most competitive economies in recent years by reducing its budget deficit and investing in early education and innovation. We applaud Morocco's efforts to integrate economically with its neighbors across the continent through its pan-African investment strategies. King Mohammed VI has taken many tours across Africa to identify investment opportunities, and Moroccan firms have a presence in dozens of African countries. As a country that lives on the crossroads of a rich cultural heritage and a bright, modern future, Morocco is an exciting place to watch.

node.name: Astana Invest 2015
node.description: The Forum will open Astana potential as the Transport and Infrastructure Hub on the Eurasian space along the route of the Silk Road. In addition will be announced the initiative on creation of Astana International Medical Hub to share practical knowledge and scientific works between Asia and Europe. A significant event will be the ceremony of presenting a certificate by the chief editor of “fDi" to the city administration on the occasion of Astana's rank 20 among the cities with free economic zones.

node.name: Kuwait Investment Outreach
node.description: Peninsula Press is currently undertaking a tailored, integrated communications campaign about Kuwait titled Kuwait Investment Outreach 2015. node.name: The Euromoney Qatar Conference 2015
node.description: The global financial and investment environment has seldom been harder to navigate. For each sign of a return to growth there is a contrary indicator of continued instability. For policy-makers, financiers and investors this landscape requires new sources of information, new analytical methods and new skillsets. We don't yet know what the next equilibrium will look like or when it will happen. But we do know that it will take some time to get there and the road will be bumpy. What we need to find our way is a top-down holistic view of the changes in play and the new opportunities and risks they bring. In short: we need a strategic view of the new reality, the new threats and the new opportunities. The 2015 Euromoney Qatar Conference will give this view. We have chosen four main themes – global 'order', finance/economics, energy, and technology. Each panel of the conference will address one global theme and specifically focus on what it means for Qatar and for Qatari investment/finance.

node.name: Asset and Waste Management Summit

The Summit aims to attract up to 400 senior professionals from different parts of the world representing a wide variety of asset, facilities and waste management industries in both the private and public sectors. With the support of the UK Trade and Investment (UKTI), the Nigerian High Commission, UK and our Strategic Partner, Total Facilities Management Limited (TFML), this event promises to be memorable and well attended.

node.name: BNamericas 4th Mexico Internet of Things & Telecom Summit

We will also bring in some case studies from other countries to illustrate the context in which the telecommunications business is developing in other markets.

A high-income economy like Oman, whose SME sector is still in its nascent stages, is yet to come to a stage where the SME sector is the primary contributor to the nation's GDP.This conference will not only showcase various best practices of economies such as the US and members of the EU, which benefit from significant contributions from their mature SME sector, but also initiate a dialogue on ways in which the Omani economy can bring about regulatory changes and incorporate some of these practices into their own system. #OSMES15"

node.name: The 18th National Housing & Property Summit

A rising property market generates a wealth effect on the economy with its multiplier effects. However, since the beginning of this year, the housing and property sector has somewhat been in the doldrums facing many challenges. Several property developers have reported slower or sluggish sales since the beginning of the year. The secondary marketing has also slowed down. The challenge of providing more affordable housing remains unmet.
